meanings.sent1: The mewing of the kitten was so cute.
meanings.sent2: I woke up to the mewing of my cat at the door.
meanings.sent3: The mewing of the cat for more treats was quite persuasive.
meanings.sent4: The mewing of the cat echoed through the empty house.
meanings.sent5: The mewing of the cat in the dark alley sent shivers down my spine.

meanings.definition: The act of crying or whimpering
meanings.sent1: Her mewing could be heard from the other room.
meanings.sent2: The mewing of the child filled the room with sadness.
meanings.sent3: After losing the game, his mewing was quite dramatic.
meanings.sent4: The mewing of the wind through the trees matched her sorrowful mood.
meanings.sent5: The mewing of the puppy waiting by the door broke my heart.

meanings.definition: The act of meowing or making a high-pitched noise
meanings.sent1: The mewing of the cat woke me up early in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The mewing of the kitten was so loud and persistent.
meanings.sent3: The mewing of the bird outside my window was surprisingly melodic.
meanings.sent4: The mewing of the car brakes made me jump in surprise.
meanings.sent5: The mewing of the violin filled the concert hall with beautiful music.
